full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'DU SHES BCU GCIG BSTAN PA'I MDO DANG, THEG PA CHEN PO 'DA' KA YE SHES KYI MDO GNYIS BZHUGS, ,*, ,BDAG NYID CHEN PO SKYES MCHOG PU TO PA'I CHIG LAB RING MO SBO BZHUGS SO
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS 'DI SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, DGE SLONG DE DAG YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'DU SHES BCU GCIG BSTAN PA'I MDO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI ZHAL CHEMS RDZOGS SO,, ,,
